Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HaNP-3 (natural AMPs; alpha, UCSS1a; 3S=S;hamster neutrophil defensin 3, rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Golden hamster or Syrian hamster,Mesocricetus auratus

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  It contains three disulfide bonds: 3,31; 5,20; 10,30.Activity: Active against S. aureus (50% inhibition, IC50 0.55 ug/ml), S. pyogenes (IC50 0.3 ug/ml), E. faecalis (IC50 0.7 ug/ml), E. coli (IC50 11.0 ug/ml), Salmonella serotype krefeld (IC50 1.8 ug/ml), K. oxytoca (IC50 2.6 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (IC50 15.6 ug/ml), C. albicans (IC50 12.9 ug/ml), and C. neoformans (IC50 0.9 ug/ml).UniProt P81467: you can view AlphaFold predicted structure.Updated 7/2021; 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Mak P., Wojcik K., Thogersen IB., Dubin A.1996
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, antimicrobial activities, and primary structures of hamster neutrophil defensins.
